input.sentences: we took a walk around the park to enjoy the sights and sounds .
the docks had many boats tied up to them .
the weather was n't too bad but we wished it was sunnier .
we were able to take quite a few good pictures .
i think we 'll return in a few weeks when summer is in full effect to take some more pictures .
output.sentences: After traveling all day yesterday, it was nice to go for a leisurely walk, taking in the sights and sounds of the area.
I soon came to the lake, where beautiful wood boats were tied to a weathered dock.
Although the clouds pretty, I wished that I had sunnier weather.
This is a great area for nature lovers to take pictures.
I leave the country in a few weeks, but hope to return when the summer season is at its finest.
